attributes.action: Humbly petition Her Majesty the Queen for a Knighthood for Ken Loach, film-maker
attributes.additional_details: Knighthoods rarely go to deserving recipients. His work is consistently of a high standard as proven by his long record of Bafta- and Palme d'Or-winning cinema.
attributes.background: Recognise the enormous contribution to the British film culture and industry of this Palme d'Or winner at the world's most prestigious film festival, Cannes.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
